name: INPlayMediaIntentHandling
desc: The interface an object implements to confirm and handle play media intents.

items.name: func resolveMediaItems(for: INPlayMediaIntent, with: ([INPlayMediaMediaItemResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the media items to play.

items.name: func resolvePlayShuffled(for: INPlayMediaIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves whether to shuffle the played media.

items.name: func resolvePlaybackQueueLocation(for: INPlayMediaIntent, with: (INPlaybackQueueLocationResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the location in the playback queue where your app plays the media.

items.name: func resolvePlaybackRepeatMode(for: INPlayMediaIntent, with: (INPlaybackRepeatModeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the repeat mode when playing media.

items.name: func resolvePlaybackSpeed(for: INPlayMediaIntent, with: (INPlayMediaPlaybackSpeedResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the playback speed when playing media.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INPlayMediaIntent, completion: (INPlayMediaIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms the details of the media playback request.
